entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 02 February 2023
